entry.name: jQuery.ajaxPrefilter
entry.title: jQuery.ajaxPrefilter()
entry.desc: Handle custom Ajax options or modify existing options before each request is sent and before they are processed by $.ajax().

argument.name: dataTypes
argument.desc: An optional string containing one or more space-separated dataTypes

argument.name: handler(options, originalOptions, jqXHR)
argument.desc: A handler to set default values for future Ajax requests.

jqXHR is the jqXHR object of the request
